title: How do we balance modernity and tradition? - Quora

response.answer_text: One can balance tradition and modernity by accepting good elements of both and by rejecting the bad elements of both. For example, if science is taken as an element of modernity, we should accept it. We have different festivals which are part of our tradition. They create brotherhood and joy in society and so we can preserve them. Similarly, casteism is a bad tradition and so we should reject it. If drinking liquor and smoking is taken as a part of modernity, we should reject it. In this way we can balance tradition and modernity.
